disciplinary.translation[0].definitions[: relating to the punishment of someone who has not obeyed rules, or to trying to make people obey rules
disciplinary hearing/committee (=a meeting or group that decides if someone should be punished)
The investigation led to disciplinary action  (=things you do to punish someone) against two officers.
disciplinary.translation[1].definitions[: concerned with how people in an organization or group should behave, and how they should be punished if they do not obey the rules
If a member of staff is continually late for work, a disciplinary code (=set of rules about behaviour and punishments) should be available to give guidance to the supervisor about what steps to take.
The investigation led to disciplinary action being taken against several officers.
